snippet.title: ---Red---Tether---Teaser---
snippet.description:
Get Red Tether on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1714080/RedTether/

Or on Itch.io:
https://sleeper-games.itch.io/red-tether

Red Tether features explosive top-down space action with a unique, indirect combat system. You'll face massive space fleets while being armed with nothing but tether-harpoons and your wits.


Press Kit: https://abyssinian-share-16b.notion.site/Red-Tether-2c4ccb99237147bdb49ec786069db6d1


Contact 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Sleeper_Games

Mail: stefan [at] sleepergames.com
Ongoing Developments: https://trello.com/b/MeGQvwZh/red-tether
